scripts.d-build: yarn run compile && sudo docker build -f docker/prod.Dockerfile -t $(yarn run --silent d-image-name)-prod .
scripts.d-run: sudo docker run --rm -d -p 3001:3000 --name $(yarn run --silent d-process-name)-prod $(yarn run --silent d-image-name)-prod
scripts.d-build:dev: sudo docker build -f docker/dev.Dockerfile --build-arg "USER=${USER}" --build-arg "UID=$(id -u $USER)" --build-arg "GID=$(id -g $USER)" --build-arg "DIR_BASE=$(yarn run --silent d-dirbase)" -t $(yarn run --silent d-image-name)-dev .
scripts.d-run:dev: sudo docker run -d --network host -v "$PWD:/home/node/$(yarn run --silent d-dirbase)" -v "$HOME/.cache:/home/emergeuser/.cache" --name $(yarn run --silent d-process-name)-dev -it --entrypoint "/bin/bash" $(yarn run --silent d-image-name)-dev
scripts.d-bash:dev: sudo docker exec -it $(yarn run --silent d-process-name)-dev bash
scripts.d-debug:dev: ( sleep 8; yarn run open-debug-chrome ) & sudo docker run --rm  --network host -v "$PWD:/home/node/$(yarn run d-dirbase --silent)" -v "$HOME/.cache:/home/emergeuser/.cache" --name $(yarn run --silent d-process-name)-debug -it --entrypoint yarn $(yarn run --silent d-image-name)-dev run debug
scripts.d-rebuild:dev: yarn run d-stop:dev && yarn run d-rm:dev && yarn run d-rmi:dev && yarn run d-build:dev
